/config.description: Choose a Share for minidlna configuration. Eg: create a Share called minidlna-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/media.description: Choose a Share for minidlna content(your media). Eg: create a Share called minidlna-data for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/media.label: Data Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run minidlna with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

minidlna.description: ReadyMedia (formerly known as MiniDLNA) is a simple media server software, with the aim of being fully compliant with DLNA/UPnP-AV clients. It is developed by a NETGEAR employee for the ReadyNAS product line.
minidlna.more_info:
Adding more media to minidlna.

You can add more Shares(with media) to minidlna from the settings wizard of this Rock-on.
